text: The Jordan University of Science and Technology ( Jami'at Al-Ulum wa Al- Tiknolojia Al-Urdunia), often abbreviated JUST, is a Jordanian public university. The university is located in the south of Ramtha District, within the boundaries of the city of Ramtha, located in the Irbid Governorate in northern Jordan. Started in 1986, its first president was the Kamel al- Ajlouni. The number of schools in it has increased, since then, from six to twelve. == References == Category:Colleges and universities in Jordan Category:1986 establishments in Asia
title: Jordan University of Science and Technology
